sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Cook County Board of Review Redistricting Act of 2011.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Cook County Board of Review Redistricting Act of 2011.

sections.heading: Board of Review Districts.  Cook County is divided into 3 Board of Review Districts as set forth in this Act.
sections.text: Board of Review Districts. Cook County is divided into 3 Board of Review Districts as set forth in this Act.

sections.heading: District No. 1. District No. 1 is comprised of:District: 1
sections.text: District No. 1. District No. 1 is comprised of:District: 1

sections.heading: District No. 2. District No. 2 is comprised of:District: 2
sections.text: District No. 2. District No. 2 is comprised of:District: 2

sections.heading: District No. 3. District No. 3 is comprised of:District: 3
sections.text: District No. 3. District No. 3 is comprised of:District: 3

sections.heading: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.
sections.text: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
